title: Vigilante but it knows how to reload a gun

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot a player at night. 0 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Every night you dont Shoot you will get an extra use of your ability.
- You get 3 uses instead of 1 at the end of night 1.
- If you shoot another Town member you will commit suicide over the guilt.
